CredentialArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Secrets Manager secret that identifies the credentials to authenticate to the upstream registry.

EcrRepositoryPrefix.description: The ECRRepositoryPrefix is a custom alias for upstream registry url.

RegistryId.description: The account ID of the registry pull-through cache repository will be created in.

UpstreamRegistry.description: The name of the upstream registry.

UpstreamRegistryUrl.description: The upstreamRegistryUrl is the endpoint of upstream registry url of the public repository to be cached

description: The AWS::ECR::PullThroughCacheRule resource configures the upstream registry configuration details for an Amazon Elastic Container Registry (Amazon Private ECR) pull-through cache.

CredentialArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Secrets Manager secret that identifies the credentials to authenticate to the upstream registry.

EcrRepositoryPrefix.description: The ECRRepositoryPrefix is a custom alias for upstream registry url.

UpstreamRegistry.description: The name of the upstream registry.

UpstreamRegistryUrl.description: The upstreamRegistryUrl is the endpoint of upstream registry url of the public repository to be cached
